section.name: Release notes
section.p: This version of the community has the following changes from version 2007.2.

The internal certificate-authority for the community is now fully supported and is part of the normal installation. Instructions on how to make and install the certificate authority's files are included in the web application.

A generator for the certificate-authority files (root certificate, private key, serial-number record) is now available. This is a separate artifact from the community web-application and must be downloaded separately. The web-application documents explain where to get the generator and how to use it.

subsection.name: Menus simplified
subsection.p: The administration menu has been simplified. Several functions that were never properly supported have been withdrawn.

subsection.name: MyProxy support
subsection.p: MyProxy is now a normal part of the installation; a community cannot function fully unless MyProxy is present. Minimal installation instructions have been added.

subsection.name: DB installation no longer needed
subsection.p: There is no longer any need to install the DB software. It is always packaged in the WAR.
